name: gracelessness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of being rude or unpleasant: There is a depressing gap between the nurses and the sheer gracelessness of some of their customers. He had a reputation for gracelessness and aggression. See
graceless
More examplesFewer examplestwo men who have somehow raised gracelessness to an art formHis gracelessness prevented him from admitting his error.He behaved with disappointing gracelessness.
